sentences.cn: 发亮的粉红色 T 恤衫

sentences.en: A typical fluorescent lamp is a tube with metal electrodes at each end.
sentences.cn: 日光灯通常是一根两端装有金属电极的管子。

sentences.en: Add a fluorescent UVB bulb to runtotal length of the enclosure.
sentences.cn: 还需要添加与饲养箱等长的UVB灯管.

sentences.en: Fluorescent bird droppings may help shed light on contested predictions in ecology.
sentences.cn: 鸟类排遗上的萤光或许能解释生态学上的一些争议.

sentences.en: Fluorescent destruction occurs about once for every ten interstellar ultraviolet photons absorbed.
sentences.cn: 每吸收十个星际紫外光子,就会发生一次荧光破坏过程.

sentences.en: Fluorescent lights are more energy - efficient than ordinary light bulbs.
sentences.cn: 荧光灯比普通灯泡节能.

sentences.en: Fluorescent lights flickered, and then the room was brilliantly, blindingly bright.
sentences.cn: 荧光灯闪了几下，接着屋子里豁然大亮，刺得人睁不开眼。

sentences.en: It was lit by hooded fluorescent lamps.
sentences.cn: 照明用的是带灯罩的日光灯。

sentences.en: Our company specializes in producing electronic ballasts of efficiency fluorescent illumination products.
sentences.cn: 本公司是一家专业从事自主研发高性能荧光灯电子镇流器的生产厂家.

sentences.en: The rear of the revolver has two fluorescent spots for night firing.
sentences.cn: 照门上有用于夜间射击的荧光点.

sentences.en: They observed the deflections of the particles by allowing them to fall on a fluorescent screen.
sentences.cn: 他们让粒子落在荧光屏上以观察他们的偏移.

sentences.en: This fluorescent lighting certainly gives the food a peculiar color, doesn't it?
sentences.cn: 这萤光灯当然增添了食物特别的色彩, 你 说是不是?

sentences.en: Tip: use fluorescent ink is most suitable for metal printing plate.
sentences.cn: 技能: 荧光油不朱最得当搁置金属印版.

sentences.en: With an 18-watt fluorescent bulb you get as much light but use 75% less electricity.
sentences.cn: 用18瓦的荧光灯灯泡有同样的亮度，而用电量却减少75％。

sentences.en: You're the one who wears the fluorescent orge watch cap when you run, correct?
sentences.cn: 你跑步的时候戴着桔色荧光帽对不对?

trans.tran_cn: 荧光的，发荧光的，（颜色、材料等）强烈反光的，发亮的
trans.tran_en: fluorescent colours are very bright and easy to see, even in the dark
